channel.title: Can someone help me or host for me

item.title: Can someone help me or host for me
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Usually it won’t let you login if you’re trying to connect to your broadcast IP (the one found here) from the same computer as it’s being hosted on. You need to use localhost.
If you’re logging in from another computer and it won’t let you. Check your firewalls.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me or host for me

item.title: Can someone help me or host for me
item.dc:creator: @collinm collinm
item.description:
@collinm wrote:

hey mopar its me collinm the one who released epicscape! im here in need of help… i portforwarded and checked server statuses and all of em say ports are open and online but when i open client it dont let me login… so if u can help me please do or if u want to host for me
if interested add me on skype mausehundcollin2
thnx
